name: Blue Hole
description: A deep underwater sinkhole creates unique marine environments and potential access to cave systems. The extreme depth creates unique exploration challenges, while the unique conditions can preserve ancient remains or create unique ecosystems.
atmosphere: Circular underwater sinkhole plunges into perfect darkness while unique conditions preserve ancient remains in oxygen-deprived depths. Isolated ecosystem exists in the crushing depths as cold water carries ancient secrets. Natural portal to the abyss. Archaeological and biological treasure in the deepest waters.
